citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15 - 3:45pm
on 04/21/2016.
Inspector arrived at facility, knocked on residence door, honked GOV horn, called listed phone number all with no
response.
